trigger_prototype.expression: ({Template Mikrotik - CCRs:ifType[{#SNMPVALUE}].last(0)}=6 or {Template Mikrotik - CCRs:ifType[{#SNMPVALUE}].last(0)}=161) and (({Template Mikrotik - CCRs:ifHighSpeed[{#SNMPVALUE}].last(0)}>0 and {Template Mikrotik - CCRs:ifHCInOctets[{#SNMPVALUE}].avg(300)}>{Template Mikrotik - CCRs:ifHighSpeed[{#SNMPVALUE}].last(0)}*0.8) or ({Template Mikrotik - CCRs:ifHighSpeed[{#SNMPVALUE}].last(0)}>0 and ({Template Mikrotik - CCRs:ifHCOutOctets[{#SNMPVALUE}].avg(300)})>({Template Mikrotik - CCRs:ifHighSpeed[{#SNMPVALUE}].last(0)})*0.8))
trigger_prototype.name: Trafego acima de 80 por cento em {HOST.NAME} - {#SNMPVALUE}
